participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emma enjoys the simple pleasures in life and has a playful side that comes out in her humor.
participant_1.background: I have several barn cats, they are a great source of entertainment when I'm not feeling productive. I am not really a blond. I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them. I hope to travel the world one day. I start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, Liam loves to express himself through makeup and enjoys the thrill of storytelling in his videos.
participant_2.background: I had a lot of fun playing with my toy cars and reading books about race cars. I spent my last vacation relaxing on the beach and reading books. I use makeup to help me feel more confident and powerful, even when my back is hurting. I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten. I make videos about makeup.

content.text: good, just got back from Central Park, where I had coffee and watched a bunch of squirrels
oh nice! I love Central Park, I spent my last vacation there reading books on the beach and relaxing
that sounds great! I'm actually from NYC, but I like to go to Central Park to get away from the city
yeah I totally get that, I'm from LA but I love going to the beach to escape the city
what do you do for fun?
I like to read, make videos about makeup, and spend time with my family
that's cool, I like to read too, I have a few barn cats that are a great source of entertainment when I'm not feeling productive
oh nice! I've always wanted a cat, but my allergies won't let me have one
yeah, I'm lucky that I'm not allergic to cats, they're so cute and cuddly
so, what are you up to this weekend?
not much, probably just going to relax and read some books
nice, I'm going to go see a movie with my friend
